languages.text: "Эй, стража, дайте-ка мне оружие и расставьте мишени!"
"Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"
languages.original_text: "Эй, стража, дайте-ка мне оружие и расставьте мишени!"

traits.locale_text: "Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"
"Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"
"Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"
"Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"
"Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"

languages.text: 「衛兵！武器を持ってこい。的を並べろ！」
languages.original_text: "Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"

traits.locale_text: 「衛兵！武器を持ってこい。的を並べろ！」

languages.text: "Muhafızlar! Bana bir silah getirin, hedefleri de ayarlayın!"
languages.original_text: "Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"

traits.locale_text: "Muhafızlar! Bana bir silah getirin, hedefleri de ayarlayın!"

languages.text: «¡Guardias! ¡Traigan un arma y preparen las dianas!».
languages.original_text: "Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Guardias! ¡Traigan un arma y preparen las dianas!».

languages.text: “守卫！给我把武器拿过来，把靶子摆好！”
languages.original_text: "Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"

traits.locale_text: “守卫！给我把武器拿过来，把靶子摆好！”

languages.text: « Gardes ! Apportez-moi une arme et installez les cibles ! »
languages.original_text: "Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"

traits.locale_text: « Gardes ! Apportez-moi une arme et installez les cibles ! »

languages.text: "Wachen! Bringt mir eine Waffe und bereitet die Ziele vor!"
languages.original_text: "Guards! Bring me a weapon and set out the targets!"

traits.locale_text: "Wachen! Bringt mir eine Waffe und bereitet die Ziele vor!"
